title.narrative: Lesotho Education Quality for Equality Project

description.narrative: The Project Development Objective (PDO) is to improve basic education service delivery and student retention in targeted schools.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement: Schedule 2, Section I.B.2 | Description: No later than May 1st in each Fiscal Year of the Recipient (or onemonth after the Effective date for the first year of Project implementation), the Recipient shall prepare and furnish to theAssociation a draft annual work plan and budget for the Project for the subsequent Fiscal Year of Project implementation, of suchscope and detail as the Association shall have reasonably requested | Frequency: Yearly
